name: Haomiao Ni
content: Haomiao Ni - Computer Science - The University of Memphis Skip to main content SearchX Safety & Security Prospective Students Current Students Parents & Family Alumni Veterans Faculty & Staff People Take Action Follow Us Online FacebookLinkedIn Home Computer Science People Faculty Pages Haomiao Ni Haomiao Ni Assistant Professor Phone Email hni@memphis.edu Fax 901.678.1506 Office Dunn Hall 131 Office Hours Call for hours Degree: PhD, Informatics, The Pennsylvania State University, 2024 Research Interests:Computer vision, machine learning, artificial intelligence Personal Website:https://sites.google.com/view/haomiaoni/home Google Scholar Dr. Ni joined the Computer Science Department in Fall 2024 after earning his PhD in Informatics from the College of Information Sciences and Technology at Pennsylvania State University. He holds a master’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences and a bachelor’s degree in Information Engineering from South China University of Technology. Dr. Ni’s research interest broadly lies in machine learning and computer vision, especially with applications in generative AI, biomedical, and healthcare domains. His research has been published in top-tier conferences and journals in the fields of medical image processing and computer vision, such as MICCAI, CVPR, and Medical Image Analysis.
